attributes.action: stop the illegal importation of puppies
attributes.additional_details: to stop puppies being imported into our country resulting in unhealthy stressed pups,distressed familys and lining the pockets of the puppy farmers these poor pups are torn from their mothers at 3 weeks and some dont even make the journey. we must raise awareness of this disgusting trade before we have a rabies epidemic and to save a lot of pain and suffering for the pups,mums and innocent unknowing familys.
